file_content.text: The holocron holds many secrets. Soon they will be the Empire's.
Lord Urduun. Agent Vikurs said you'd be interested in this holocron.
Jedi-made, gatekeeper intact, even predates House Thul's exile from Alderaan. Perfect.
The Jedi were foolish to hide these secrets from the Sith. Thanks to you, they now belong to the Empire.
Thank you, agent. Intelligence hungers for these secrets. Soon they will be sated.
I must study this. Take your payment, hunter. It is deserved.
You serve the Empire well. Now excuse me. House Thul's secrets will soon be ours.
I sense there are secrets buried beneath Alderaan.
